name: Entopic
overview:
Entopic creates concepts and content to increase the effectiveness of online communication, marketing and sales.

The internet agency Entopic features a dedicated team of editorial specialists, social media moderators and marketing consultants who develop online concepts and content. Our web editors, copywriters and internet marketers create and publish customised content for our customerâ€™s websites, social media, intranets and e-mail newsletters. Our project managers and senior consultants assist our customers with website development, functional design and implementation. We work for customers like Ahold, Canon, Kluwer, Mercedes-Benz, MSN, ING, Philips, Rabobank and all Dutch ministries.

In addition to its editorial work, Entopic provides customers with an e-mail platform for the distribution of e-mail newsletters. The company also assists in the selection of content management systems and publishes related information in its yearly Dutch cms-guide: Gids Content Management Systemen and the two-yearly intranet publication: Intranet Monitor. Every year Entopic organizes the Intranet Congres, the national meeting and knowledge exchange for all Dutch intranet professionals.

Would you like to meet us or receive additional information? Just contact us or call +31(0)20 305 91 49.
